field.name: summary
field.value: Creation of a Generic interface type registered under Transient LifeStyle, always return same concrete instance (under the same thread at least)

field.name: description
field.value:
This patch apply to DefaultGenericHandler class. It changes the behavior of the sub handler build process.
If the sub component do not have any Lifestyle specified, the main component's lifestyle is now used.
I really don't know if this behavior fits in the whole picture, but it didn't break any unit tests.
Forums related topic: http://forum.castleproject.org/viewtopic.php?t=3500
